original_text: And they came to the threshingfloor of Atad, which is beyond Jordan, and there they mourned with a great and very sore lamentation: and he made a mourning for his father seven days.
korean_text: 그들이 요단 강 건너편 아닷 타작 마당에 이르러 거기서 크게 울고 애통하며 요셉이 아버지를 위하여 칠 일 동안 애곡하였더니

sentences.original_text: And they came to the threshingfloor of Atad
with a great and very sore lamentation
and he made a mourning for his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버지를 위해 애곡의 기간을 만들었으며
